title: New Digital Custodian Promises RIAs Big Savings
text:
Text size

Photograph by Charles Lks

Altruist – a new digital, commission-free custodian for RIAs – will save advisors up to 90% on technology and custody costs, says founder Jason Wenk, in an interview with RIAIntel.

For years, Charles Schwab and other behemoth custodians that oversee trillions of dollars in assets have battled for advisors’ and investors’ money, going tit for tat on price reductions and expanding their service offerings. But as RIAIntel puts it in its profile of the new company, Altruist intends to beat them at their own game. “Our goal is for everyone to really pay almost nothing,” Wenk said.
